mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, pwd, name, phone) VALUES(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT qna.*, comment.content cmt FROM qna left join comment on(qna.id = comment.qna_id) ORDER BY qna.id desc LiMIT #{offset},#{perPager}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(title, content, date) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, Now())
